summary: During the events of May 1968 in France, different worldviews of conflicting relatives are collide in their family estate.
cast: Miou-Miou|Michel Piccoli|Michel Duchaussoy|Bruno Carette|Paulette Dubost|Harriet Walter|Martine Gautier|Rozenne Le Tallec|Jeanne Herry|Renaud Danner|François Berléand|Dominique Blanc|Serge Angeloff|Anne-Marie Bonange|Marcel Bories|Bernard Brocas|Stéphane Broquedis|Etienne Draber|Diane Gracis|Denise Juskiewenski|Valérie Lemercier|Stéphane Paoli|Benjamin Prieur|Nicolas Prieur|Hubert Saint-Macary|Jacqueline Staup|Georges Vaur
keywords: dancing around corpse|year 1968|comedy of manners|sophisticated comedy|political satire
title: Milou en mayo
